messages.debugSaveRequired: Debug requires saving current data first, please save before executing debug

auth.title: Scenario Permissions
auth.onTips: After enabling "Permission Control", manual authorization of service permissions is required to have corresponding operation permissions for scenarios. "Permission Control" is enabled by default. Note: If the authorized object does not have parent directory permissions, view permissions will be automatically granted.
auth.offTips: After enabling "No Permission Control", all users will be allowed to publicly view and operate the current scenario. Users viewing the scenario must also have parent directory permissions for the current scenario.

execLog.noProxyInfo: No proxy access information, connection failed at:

messages.generateDataSuccess: Data generation created successfully, please check progress and results in 'Execution'.

hints.batchRows: Number of rows to generate, store or send in each batch, default 1, maximum 10000.
hints.batchInsert: When set to true, {batchRows} rows will be merged into one INSERT statement
hints.driverClassName: Default driver class name will be used if not specified

hints.execPriority: Higher priority executes first, range: 0~2147483647, higher value means higher priority.
hints.rows: Total number of data rows to generate, maximum 100000000000.

storageTips.datasource: Datasource storage, writes generated data to database.
storageTips.dataspace: Data space storage, stores data in AngusTester application 'Data' -> 'Space'.
storageTips.local: Local storage, generated data will be stored as files on execution nodes, you can enter execution details page to download data files. Default storage path: ${AGENT_HOME}/data/exec/[ExecutionID]/data.[DataFormat].
storageTips.pushThird: Push to third-party interface, supports sending generated data as text or file to an Http interface.

placeholders.scriptName: Enter data script name, limited to 200 characters

hints.batchRows: Number of rows to generate, store or send in each batch, default 1, maximum 10000.
hints.defaultStoragePath: Storage path for generated data files on execution nodes.

authority.title: Scene Authority
authority.onTips: After enabling 'Permission Control', you need to manually authorize service permissions to have scene operation permissions, 'Permission Control' is enabled by default. Note: If the authorized object does not have parent directory permissions, view permissions will be automatically granted.
authority.offTips: After enabling 'No Permission Control', all users will be allowed to publicly view and operate the current scene, and viewing users also need to have parent directory permissions for the current scene.

selectApiModal.title: Select API
selectApiModal.alreadyReferenced: The selected interfaces contain already referenced interfaces and cannot be referenced repeatedly.

selectUseCaseModal.title: Select Use Case
selectUseCaseModal.alreadyReferenced: The selected use cases contain already referenced use cases and cannot be referenced repeatedly.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Extract data from the current sampling request or response and store it in variables for use in subsequent requests.
variables.noVariablesDefined: You have not defined any variables

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Datasets are used to store and manage test data, supporting multiple data formats and parameterized configurations.
dataset.noDatasetsDefined: You have not defined any datasets

previewDataModal.title: Preview Data
previewDataModal.description: View actual data content in the dataset

datasetModal.title: Reference Variables
datasetModal.description: Configure basic information and parameters of the dataset
datasetModal.name: Name

dataset.staticParametersDescription: Parameter values are dynamically generated based on Mock data functions during sampling. Each dataset allows maximum 200 parameters and supports generating up to 100 billion rows of data.

datasetUseListField.description: View resource information that uses variables.

hintTextMap.file: Read dataset from file, each dataset allows maximum 200 parameters, each parameter file maximum 500MB, total rows not exceeding 1 million.
hintTextMap.jdbc: Extract a value from database query results as dataset value before each test execution.

dataset.recycleTooltip: After all data rows in the dataset are used, data will be reused from the beginning.
dataset.stopThreadTooltip: After all data rows in the dataset are used, stop the current sampling thread execution. When all threads finish reading all rows, the entire execution exits and ends.
dataset.allThreadTooltip: All threads share the same dataset data.
dataset.currentThreadTooltip: Each thread copies its own dataset data.
dataset.confirmUnlinkDataset: Are you sure to unlink dataset [{name}]?
dataset.name: Name

regexp.title: Regular Expression Match
regexp.data: When position is not specified or position 0 is specified, both take the merged match value at position 0: "1888888888813999999999". Specifying position 1 takes value: "18888888888". Specifying position 2 takes value: "13999999999".

jsonpath.title: JSONPath Match
jsonpath.data: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: [{"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100},{"title":"confucianism","price":200}]. Specifying position 0 takes value: {"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100}. Specifying position 1 takes value: {"title":"confucianism","price":200}.

xpath.title: XPath Match
xpath.data: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: "30codingbasketballAngus132codingAngus2". Specifying position 0 takes value: "30codingbasketballAngus1". Specifying position 1 takes value: "32codingAngus2".

matchItemPopover.description: When an expression matches multiple values or the result is an array, specify which value to use as the expected value of the expression. Supports positions from 0 to a maximum of 2000. Returns null when the specified position data does not exist. When not specified, merges multiple values into one value.

assertionForm.title: Assertion Form
assertionForm.description: Assertions are used to verify that responses meet expectations, supporting multiple assertion types and conditions.
assertionForm.noAssertionsDefined: You have not defined any assertions

conditionPopover.title: Condition Selection
conditionPopover.variableDescription: "Variable" refers to variables defined in the current interface, parent project/service, or globally, where variable reference symbols {} can be omitted.
conditionPopover.valueDescription: The "value" on the right side of the operator can only be a constant.

expectedPopover.title: Expected Value
expectedPopover.matchItemDescription: When an expression matches multiple values or the result is an array, specify which value to use as the expected value of the expression. Supports positions from 0 to a maximum of 2000. Returns null when the specified position data does not exist. When not specified, merges multiple values into one value.
expectedPopover.emptyExpectedDescription: When the expression matches a value, the assertion passes; otherwise, it fails.
expectedPopover.nonEmptyExpectedDescription: When the expression match value equals the expected value, the assertion passes; otherwise, it fails.
expectedPopover.regexpItemDescription: When position is not specified or position 0 is specified, both take the merged match value at position 0: "1888888888813999999999". Specifying position 1 takes value: "18888888888". Specifying position 2 takes value: "13999999999".
expectedPopover.jsonpathItemDescription: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: [{"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100},{"title":"confucianism","price":200}]. Specifying position 0 takes value: {"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100}. Specifying position 1 takes value: {"title":"confucianism","price":200}.
expectedPopover.xpathItemDescription: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: "30codingbasketballAngus132codingAngus2". Specifying position 0 takes value: "30codingbasketballAngus1". Specifying position 1 takes value: "32codingAngus2".

matchItemPopover.title: Match Item
matchItemPopover.regexpItemDescription: When position is not specified or position 0 is specified, both take the merged match value at position 0: "1888888888813999999999". Specifying position 1 takes value: "18888888888". Specifying position 2 takes value: "13999999999".
matchItemPopover.jsonpathItemDescription: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: [{"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100},{"title":"confucianism","price":200}]. Specifying position 0 takes value: {"title":"Sayings of the Century","price":100}. Specifying position 1 takes value: {"title":"confucianism","price":200}.
matchItemPopover.xpathItemDescription: When position is not specified, the merged result is taken by default: "30codingbasketballAngus132codingAngus2". Specifying position 0 takes value: "30codingbasketballAngus1". Specifying position 1 takes value: "32codingAngus2".

assertions.expressionEmpty: Expression is empty, execute this assertion
assertions.operationResultNotEstablished: Operation result not established, ignore this assertion
assertions.operationResultEstablished: Operation result established, execute this assertion
assertions.noVariableDefined: No {variable} variable defined, execute this condition expression directly
assertions.ignoreAssertionsTip: You have enabled ignore assertions, assertions will not be executed this time. If you need to enable assertions, please turn off the ignore assertions option in {executionConfig} > {pluginConfig}.

conditionMap.notEmpty: Not Empty (non-empty string or null value)

jdbcConfig.processResultRowsTooltip: Default 1000, maximum 10000 rows. When actual returned result rows exceed the set processing query result rows, they will be ignored.
jdbcConfig.inputOutputTooltip: Parameter value is required when input/output value is 'IN' or 'INOUT'
jdbcConfig.parameterValuePlaceholder: Parameter value (optional. Note: Parameter value is required when input/output value is 'IN' or 'INOUT')

conditionMap.NOT_EMPTY: Is Not Empty (non-empty string or null value)

authorizeModal.title: Scenario Permission
authorizeModal.onTips: After enabling 'Permission Control', manual authorization of service permissions is required to have corresponding operation permissions for scenarios. 'Permission Control' is enabled by default. Note: If the authorized object does not have parent directory permissions, view permissions will be automatically granted.
authorizeModal.offTips: After enabling 'No Permission Control', all users will be allowed to publicly view and operate the current scenario. Users viewing need to have parent directory permissions for the current scenario.
